::Rex/Firearm::

Rex raises an eyebrow as he sees the impressive amount of weapons that the 
prisoners drop.

"Firearm, I believe you know what to do..." Rex says, Firearm nodding. 
Firearm sets his weapon to flame thrower, sending out a continous streak of 
fire at the weapon piles.
